Service.Name: ServiceToBindFromSub

Action.Name: InvokeWorkflow

Name="HasError" /> <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Name="ExplicitDataList" /> <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Boolean" Name="IsValid" /> <Variable x:TypeArguments="uf:UnlimitedObject" Name="d" /> <Variable x:TypeArguments="uaba:Util" Name="t" /> </Flowchart.Variables> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">False</x:Boolean> <av:Point x:Key="ShapeLocation">270,2.5</av:Point> <av:Size x:Key="ShapeSize">60,75</av:Size> <x:Double x:Key="Height">804</x:Double> <av:PointCollection x:Key="ConnectorLocation">300,77.5 300,107.5 300,166</av:PointCollection> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <Flowchart.StartNode> <FlowStep x:Name="__ReferenceID0"> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity CurrentResult="{x:Null}" ExplicitDataList="{x:Null}" InputMapping="{x:Null}" InputTransformation="{x:Null}" Add="False" AmbientDataList="[AmbientDataList]" CreateBookmark="False" DatabindRecursive="False" DisplayName="Assign(1)" HasError="[HasError]" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="256,88" InstructionList="[InstructionList]" IsSimulationEnabled="False" IsUIStep="False" IsValid="[IsValid]" IsWorkflow="False" OnResumeClearAmbientDataList="False" OnResumeClearTags="FormView,InstanceId,Bookmark,ParentWorkflowInstanceId,ParentServiceName,WebPage" UpdateAllOccurrences="False"> <uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="[[result]]" FieldValue="{}{{
 var max = "[[max]]";
 var inputMatch = "[[masterRegion]]";
 if(max.length < 1){
 max = 100;
 }
 var i = 0;
 var id = "<Data>";
 var value = new Array();
 for(var i = 0; i <= max; i++){
 
 if( ("region"+i) == inputMatch){
 for(var q = 0; q <= 5; q++){
 id += "<regions>";
 id += "<id>"+i+"</id>";
 id += "<sub>region"+i+"_sub" +((q+i)+10) + "</sub>";
 id += "</regions>";
 }
 }
 }
 id += "</Data>";
}}" IndexNumber="1" /> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="" FieldValue="" IndexNumber="2" /> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity> </FlowStep> </Flowchart.StartNode> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID0</x:Reference> </Flowchart> </Activity>
